item.title: Terraforming a Load Balancer in AWS
item.author: cap@blackett.lol (blackett)
item.description: About This guide assumes you have already installed and configured the AWS CLI and have Terraform installed on your computer. Throughout the guide are code snippets from the files in this project. To keep you on your toes they require you to input your resource names etc. No brainless copy/paste allowed. This proejct was adapted from a blog post by Sharmila S. I went through the project myself and wrote this guide to solidify my understanding of how infrastructure on AWS can be deployed via Terraform.
